pkgmetadata.longdescription: # outline-vpn-apiA Python API wrapper for [Outline VPN](https://getoutline.org/)[![Test](https://github.com/jadolg/outline-vpn-api/actions/workflows/test.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/jadolg/outline-vpn-api/actions/workflows/test.yml) ![](https://img.shields.io/pypi/dm/outline-vpn-api.svg)## How to use```pythonfrom outline_vpn.outline_vpn import OutlineVPN# Setup the access with the API URL (Use the one provided to you after the server setup)client = OutlineVPN(api_url="https://127.0.0.1:51083/xlUG4F5BBft4rSrIvDSWuw")# Get all access URLs on the serverfor key in client.get_keys(): print(key.access_url)# Create a new keynew_key = client.create_key()# Rename itclient.rename_key(new_key.key_id, "new_key")# Delete itclient.delete_key(new_key.key_id)# Set a monthly data limit for a key (20MB)client.add_data_limit(new_key.key_id, 1024 * 1024 * 20)# Remove the data limitclient.delete_data_limit(new_key.key_id)```
